page.title: 16ANOTHER CLITHEROE GAME
page.content:
Another of our favourite playground games is P for Poison.
P FOR POISON For this game you first choose one person to be on. The people who are not on hold onto that persons fingers. The person who is on says things like P for Potato or P for Pea. When the person who is on says P for Poison the other people run off. When they are 'tug' they have to go and lean against the wall. To free them someone has to run under their arms. If you get 'tug' three times you are on. It sounds hard but really it is easy.
N.B. 'tug' = to be touched.
